location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bassidore to the Officer Commanding Mail Steamer passing up the Gulf, Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas]

mods.abstract: Letter requesting the favour that the Mail Steamer collect any letters for Lewis Pelly's address at Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas] and deliver them to him at Lingah [Bandar-e-Lengeh] , or if he is not there to give them to his agent.The letter also informs the officer that there will be letters and possibly passengers to be taken on at Lingah.
